description:
Mei`s dreams of influencer stardom become reality when a series of not-so-truthful social media posts take on a life of their own.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: 5月の誕生石はエメラルドな地獄 / 地獄のタッカーーーン
Gogatsu no Tanjouseki wa Emerald na Jigoku / Jigoku no Takkaaaan
May`s Birthstone Is Emerald as All Hell / An Enlightened Day In Hell
